2 in 1 Cleanes and refreshes
The detox cleansing foam for oily and combination skin that deeply purifies, cleanses and detoxifies the skin, thanks to the extract of Witch-hazel and Calendula. It closes the pores leaving your skin without any grease for longer. Its soft foam provides a feeling of freshness in the skin.
When using it daily you will notice the WOW effect from the first application, since it eliminates EVERYTHING, EVERYTHING, EVERYTHING. Its perfect foamy texture makes cleaning your skin a true ritual of pleasure. Surprise yourself!
81% natural ingredients. Material packaging PET , 100% RECYCLABLE.
The secret lies in our amazing ingredients
AQUA/WATER, DECYL GLUCOSIDE, COCOAMIDOPROPYLBETAINE, GLYCERIN, PROPANEDIOL, SALYCILIC ACID**, SORBITAN CAPRYLATE, CAPRYLYL/CAPRYL GLUCOSIDE, AZELAIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PARFUM/FRAGANCE*, ALLANTOIN, BENZOIC ACID, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA LEAF EXTRACT, BENZYL ALCOHOL, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, PANTHENOL, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS EXTRACT.
*No harsh synthetic chemicals **This product is not recommended for Pregnancy and Breastfeeding, as it contains Salicylic Acid and although according to the SCCS (Scientific Committee on Consumer Safety) we are well below the 3% limit, and therefore it would be totally safe to use, we prefer not to recommend it, as we do not know if you are using products with this ingredient and therefore reach the limit percentage.
HOW TO USE
Apply onto wet skin and massage using circular motions.
Remove with plenty of warm water.
IDEAL FOR
Vegans, Breastfeeding and Pregnancy*, Celiac, Oily Skin, Mixed skin, Open pores, Cruelty free.
